data.comment: The match has started at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Portland have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Robert Sibiga awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 8, Portland to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Goal kick for Portland at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 11, Douglas Martinez is on target to give Salt Lake a 1-0 advantage.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick in a good position for Portland!
Portland pushes forward through Diego Valeri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Robert Sibiga signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 16, Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Marcelo Silva (Salt Lake) gets a yellow card.
In Sandy, Jeremy Ebobisse (Portland) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
Throw-in Portland.
In Sandy Salt Lake attack through Damir Kreilach. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Robert Sibiga awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Robert Sibiga signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Salt Lake's area.
In the minute 22, Robert Sibiga signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Portland's half.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Salt Lake's Damir Kreilach misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Portland at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
It's now 2-0 in Sandy as Damir Kreilach scores for Salt Lake.
In the minute 26, That's a fine assist from Pablo Ruiz.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Salt Lake are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 30, Damir Kreilach of Salt Lake smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Damir Kreilach (Salt Lake) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 30, Robert Sibiga awards Portland a goal kick.
Salt Lake's Douglas Martinez gets in a shot on goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake drives towards goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Douglas Martinez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Salt Lake.
Douglas Martinez is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 40, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Portland.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Throw-in for Portland at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 45, Robert Sibiga will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Salt Lake.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Sandy.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Portland in the half of Salt Lake.
The away team have replaced Tomas Conechny with Yimmi Chara. This is the first substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Salt Lake's Damir Kreilach breaks free at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
In the minute 47, In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Robert Sibiga signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Portland's half.
Salt Lake are caught offside.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Portland are coming forward and Cristhian Paredes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Portland to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corey Baird (Salt Lake) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felipe Mora (Portland) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 58, Throw-in high up the field for Portland in Sandy.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Portland just outside Salt Lake's area.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 59, Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
Portland's Cristhian Paredes is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 63, Play has been interrupted briefly in Sandy to check on Douglas Martinez, who is grimacing with pain.
Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
Justin Meram is replacing Douglas Martinez for the home team.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 66, Portland drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In Sandy, Damir Kreilach of Salt Lake is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 69, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Justen Glad is replacing Marcelo Silva for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 70, Portland have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Portland surge into the attack at Rio Tinto Stadium but Bill Tuilomaâ€™s header is off-target.
Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Salt Lake.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Portland needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Portland at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 75, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Salt Lake needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
Salt Lake will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Portland.
In the minute 77, Goal for Portland! They are now just 2-1 behind thanks to a Bill Tuiloma header.
Diego Valeri instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Portland.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Free kick Portland.
In the minute 80, Jeremy Ebobisse gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portland.
Corner awarded to Portland.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Portland in the half of Salt Lake.
Aaron Herrera (Salt Lake) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 83, Bill Tuiloma (Portland) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 84, Dario Zuparic is on a sub for Marco Farfan for Portland.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a third substitution, with Marvin Loria replacing Pablo Bonilla.
Robert Sibiga signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 85, Freddy Juarez is making the team's third substitution at Rio Tinto Stadium with Kyle Beckerman replacing Nick Besler.
The home team replace Pablo Ruiz with Justin Portillo.
In the minute 86, Robert Sibiga awards the away team a throw-in.
Freddy Juarez (Salt Lake) is making a fifth substitution, with Tate Schmitt replacing Maikel Chang.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Robert Sibiga awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Jeremy Ebobisse (Portland) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Portland in Sandy.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Salt Lake.
In Sandy Portland drive forward through Marvin Loria. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
The match has come to a close in Sandy. The final score is 2-1.
Salt Lake's Justin Portillo has been booked in Sandy.
